skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: The art of crafting dynamic and user-friendly interfaces. A great front-end is like a good book – it draws you in and keeps you hooked!

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: The backbone of any powerful application. This is where the logic is defined, data is processed, and things are kept running smoothly.

skills.title: Full-Stack
skills.description: The complete package. From database to user, handling every step of the process. Full-stack development is like conducting a whole symphony!

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.description: Life on the move. At home, in the park, at work – quality mobile apps make a difference everywhere. Mobile development is all around us.
